job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: About NimbleNimble is a Series A startup founded from the AI labs at Stanford and Carnegie Mellon. We’re pioneering the way robots learn to grasp and manipulate any object.Our ultimate goal is to create the dark warehouse, a fully automated eCommerce fulfillment center with swarms of intelligent, cloud-connected robots to enable affordable same-day fulfillment for every retailer, large and small. In the process we aim to create one of the world’s most valuable robotics companies.We’re backed by the world’s most prestigious investors as well as AI and robotics legends like Fei-Fei Li (Chief Scientist of AI at Google, Director of Stanford’s AI lab) and Sebastian Thrun (founder of Google X, Waymo, Kitty Hawk, and Udacity)!About The RoleHelp us advance our robotics moonshot by designing, building, and supporting features that empower machine learning algorithms and robotic systems. You’ll create foundational, scalable systems that extend horizontally throughout the stack. You will design and architect solutions to complex software engineering challenges, take ownership of projects, and push deployments to production.You will play a critical role in working with our world-class cross-functional team to architect and build the world’s most advanced robotic systems for the world’s biggest robotics opportunity!ResponsibilitiesDevelop large-scale distributed systems and data processing systemsDevelop advanced algorithms to obtain optimal real-time performanceDesign APIs for testability, scalability, usability and maintainabilityDevelop and maintain massive data infrastructureProvide input on all aspects of product development from brainstorming to final delivery.Welcome new challenges and work independently across disciplines to both investigate issues and identify solutions.QualificationsFast learner, A-player, great work ethic and ambitiousBS/MS/Ph.D. in Computer Science, Mathematics, Electrical Engineering or a related discipline, or equivalent experience.Strong experience writing production code in Python and C++3+ years of experience with Linux or embedded Linux. Expert with LinuxStrong problem solver and advanced Python programmingAbility to identify and resolve bugs and issues.Nice To HaveParticipation in hackathons Experience with robotics, ROSMachine Learning InfrastructureSoftware Performance tuning and OptimizationRobotics Software FrameworksBenefitsComprehensive medical, dental, and vision insurance. Paid holidays, generous PTO, competitive wages and meaningful equity of Nimble.CultureWe embrace challenges and strive to make the impossible possible each day. We’re not in this to do what’s easy or to be mediocre. We want to create something legendary and leave our mark on the world. We’re ambitious, we’re gritty, we’re humble and we’re relentlessly resourceful in pursuit of our goals. If this sounds like you then you might be a great fit!Presshttps://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20210311005117/en/Nimble-%C2%AE-Robotics-Raises-[…]llion-to-Build-the-Future-of-On-Demand-Robotic-Fulfillmenthttps://techcrunch.com/2021/03/11/nimble-robotics-scores-50m-for-its-fulfillment-automation-tech/https://multichannelmerchant.com/operations/nimble-robotics-takes-in-50m-adds-ai-luminaries/Equal Opportunity EmployerWe are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We prohibit any form of workplace discrimination based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
